headline: Biogen Launches Phase 3 Pediatric Trial Of Omaveloxolone For Friedreich Ataxia.
summary: Biogen Inc. (NASDAQ:BIIB) is among the 11 Best Genomics Stocks to Buy According to Hedge Funds. It has begun dosing in the global Phase 3 BRAVE trial to test omaveloxolone (SKYCLARYS®) in children aged 2 to 16 with Friedreich ataxia (FA), a rare neurological illness. About 255 participants will be included in the randomized, double-blind […]
